com.avaya.ic.sdk
Interface EmailMessage

All Known Subinterfaces:
EmailDocument, EmailDraft
public interface EmailMessage

Represents an email message, and provides access to the basic fields of the email. EmailMessage is an interface implemented by the objects that represent an email, whether inbound or outbound. EmailDocument and EmailDraft implement this interface.

Nested Class Summary
static class EmailMessage.ContentType
          Defines the different content types of an email message.
static class EmailMessage.Type
          Defines the different types of an email message.

getCharSet

java.lang.String getCharSet()
Get The character set used in the body of the EmailDraft. By default, the charset used is the same as the inbound EmailDocument. The CharSet must be explicitly set for new outbound email drafts.

Returns:
The character set used in the body of the EmailDraft. By default, the charset used is the same as the inbound EmailDocument. The CharSet must be explicitly set for new outbound email drafts.

Returns:

getContent

java.lang.String getContent(EmailMessage.ContentType contentType)
Gets the content of the email message with the specified ContentType.

Parameters:
contentType - The type of content to be retrieved.
Returns:
The content of the email, if available in the requested ContentType.
